New Records: Juan Soto hit a three-run homer in the 10th inning, Giancarlo Stanton was named ALCS MVP and hit a two-run homer, moving him into fourth place on the Yankees' career list for post-season home runs
Key Match Events: Juan Soto's game-winning three-run homer in the 10th inning, Giancarlo Stanton's two-run homer in the sixth inning, Cleveland Guardians' rally in the fifth inning for a 2-0 lead
Pre-Game Insights: Juan Soto's acquisition was a key move for the Yankees, Giancarlo Stanton's physicality and discipline at the plate were highlighted by Aaron Boone
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Boone expressed pride in the team's resilience, Stephen Vogt acknowledged the team's effort but the ultimate defeat
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series was a tough one with three consecutive close games, Yankees' journey back to the World Series after a tough season
Others: Nestor Cortes' progress in recovery, Yankees' core stayed mostly intact, acquisition of Juan Soto in a seven-player trade
